title: Om Shanti Om
synopsis: Om, a junior film artist, is smitten by Shantipriya, a renowned actress. But he is killed while trying to save her from a fire. Thirty years later, he is reborn and sets out to avenge her death.

title: Hera Pheri
synopsis: Two tenants and a landlord, in desperate need of money, chance upon a ransom call via a cross connection. They hatch a plan to claim the ransom for themselves.

title: The Lion Of Punjab
synopsis: The story revolves around a bunch of Indians in the US trying to keep the Bollywood spirit alive.

title: Swades
synopsis: A non-resident Indian (NRI) searching for clues to his past returns to India where he was born.

title: Asoka
synopsis: During his exile, Asoka falls in love with Kaurwaki. But Asoka's life turns upside down, when Kaurwaki dies in an unfortunate event.

title: Yuva
synopsis: Youth leader Michael is shot by hit man Inba. Arjun, a student and sole witness, saves him. As we see the recent events of their lives, we also realise this incident is going to change things forever.

title: Arjun
synopsis: Arjun has faced an uphill task, be it his education, career or even family life. When widespread corruption, crime and injustice take a toll on him, he decides to revolt. But more betrayals await him.

title: Ram Jaane
synopsis: Ram Jaane is an orphan who grows up to be a criminal. He meets his childhood friend again and life changes for him.

title: Oh Darling Yeh Hai India
synopsis: A gangster plans to take over the country by cloning the President. A boy and girl who are complete strangers to each other get wind of this conspiracy and try to save the country. Will they succeed?

title: Chaahat
synopsis: Roop and his father come to the city for medical treatment where Reshma falls in love with Roop. But Roop loves Pooja. However, Roop faces a critical situation when Reshma threatens to kill herself.

title: English Babu Desi Mem
synopsis: It is the journey of a NRI multimillionaire who arrives in India to take back home his estranged brother's eight-year-old son.

title: Happy New Year
synopsis: In a quest to pull off a heist at a hotel in Dubai, Charlie assembles a team of non-dancers to take part in a dance competition at the hotel. They enlist the help of a bar dancer.

title: Vardi
synopsis: Constable Bhagwan is killed by Lalchand, a gangster. Years later, Bhagwan's son Ajay, along with his father's close associate Inspector Verma, tries to nab Lalchand and bring him to justice.

title: Chamatkar
synopsis: Village teacher Sunder feels betrayed and lost in the city. Venting his frustration in a graveyard, he meets Marco, the ghost of a man who was betrayed by his own. The two decide to help each other.

title: Dilwale
synopsis: Raj falls hopelessly in love with Meera, but they have to part ways due to their families' rivalry. Fifteen years later, they are destined to meet again when their respective siblings fall in love.

title: Maya Memsaab
synopsis: Maya is a woman who is married to a doctor but finds herself seeking more than mere marriage. She has more than one affair and eventually dies, leaving the authorities puzzled.

title: Kabhi Haan Kabhi Naa
synopsis: Sunil loves Anna. But Anna and Chris love each other. Now Sunil does everything in his power to break them apart and win over Anna.

title: Dear Zindagi
synopsis: After a series of career and relationship downturns, Kaira begins suffering from insomnia. She contacts Dr Jehangir Khan, a psychologist, who uses unconventional methods to treat her.

title: Punjab Singh
synopsis: Lali Sarkaria and his goons rule Amritsar, a holy city for Punjabis. A villager named Punjab Singh enters the holy city to make a living. But a tragic event changes him and he decides to rid the city of Lali Sarkaria and is men. Meanwhile, an honest cop tries to maintain law and order in the city.

title: Bhagat Singh Di Udeek
synopsis: An Army officer makes it his own personal mission to fight injustice.

title: Munde Patiale De
synopsis: Three college friends Samar, Gill and Lucky, who meet up after a long time at Samar’s wedding, and the funny situations that they land up in, makes for the plot. The film is an out-and-out comedy.

title: Kabaddi Once Again
synopsis: A village boy dreams to take Kabbadi on international standards. But his dreams get shattered when he gets to know about fixing and use of illegal drugs.

title: Rab Ton Sohna Ishq
synopsis: Childhood sweethearts Kiran & Sooraj are torn apart by Kiran's gangster older brother. What happens when they come face to face years later?

title: Bade Changay Ne Mere Yaar Kaminey
synopsis: Karan and Nikku are two lifelong friends who live a very dull life dominated by their wives. However, their third friend Sunny does a good job at managing his married life and adulterous activities.

title: Sadi Gali Aaya Karo
synopsis: A love triangle that revolves around two young lads, one from Punjab and one from Haryana. The twist in the tale occurs when both boys fall in love with the same girl who belongs to Chandigarh.

title: Punjab Bolda
synopsis: Gurbaj manages a theater troupe and influences the local youth to rise up against the government.

title: You N Me
synopsis: The thrilling love story of Varinder Grewal & Jyotika set against confusion & chaos.

title: Pata Nahi Rabb Kehdeyan Rangan Ch Raazi
synopsis: Harman, who hails from a poor family, falls for rich girl Simran. He goes to Bangkok and returns to his land after earning wealth and success. He meets up with Simran and hopes to confess his love.

title: Yaar Anmulle
synopsis: Guri, Deep and Sher Singh are three university friends living in a hostel. They experience all aspects of friendship like bunking classes, dealing with rival groups and matters of the heart.

title: Pure Punjabi
synopsis: Four friends from Punjab embark on a journey to make a mark in the world of pop music and form a band. While they face opposition from their parents, they continue to pursue their passions.

title: Ek Duje Ke liye
synopsis: This cross-culture romance between a southern Vaasu and a northern Sapna epitomizes inter-caste and inter-state romance.

title: Saamri
synopsis: Feared by many, a wealthy old man named Saamri, lives alone in his huge mansion and is known for his magic and exorcism.

title: Veerana
synopsis: A young woman possessed by the dark spirit of a witch goes on a killing spree to quench her thirst for blood.

title: Purani Haveli
synopsis: An old mansion harbors a blood thirsty monster that kills and devours humans entering the place. The killing spree of the monster is put to an end by a priest, who manages to lock it in the mansion's dungeon. The evil monster now lies in wait to...

title: 100 Days
synopsis: A young clairvoyant woman has a vision of a murder. She sets out to find the killer and stop him before he commits the crime.

stars.name: Jackie Shroff,Madhuri Dixit,Laxmikant Berde,Moon Moon Sen

title: Gardish
synopsis: A peace-loving man has to resort to violence when his father is beaten up by mobsters.

stars.name: Jackie Shroff,Amrish Puri,Aishwarya,Farida Jalal,Dimple Kapadia,Asrani,Mukesh Rishi,Raj Babbar,Suresh Oberoi

title: Betaaj Badshah
synopsis: Betaaj Badshah is about the hot headed village god father, Raja Prithviraj who fights against the evils in the society.

title: Viraasat
synopsis: The 1998 Filmfare Critics Award for Best Film, the movie explores the tension between two fundamentals - the individual versus the community.

title: Gunda
synopsis: Shankar, an honest man, innocently comes in the way of a gang lord's mission, leading to them killing his father and sister. Shankar vows that he shall get his revenge by eliminating the whole gang.

title: Aakrosh
synopsis: To investigate the disappearance of three medical students, a CBI officer goes in the rural India and is taken aback by the truth which he uncovers. Will he be able to save himself?

title: Zor
synopsis: When a police commissioner is accused of treachery, his son sets out to restore his father's dignity and pride.

title: Vaastav - The Reality
synopsis: Raghu and his friend Dedh Footiya start a 'pav-bhaji' stall, however, an altercation with a customer soon makes them run for cover. With no hope for their safety, they choose to enter the underworld.

title: Chandni Bar
synopsis: Gritty drama about a young woman who moves to Mumbai after she loses her parents and her town is destroyed by religious strife. She accepts work as a bar dancer in order to survive.

stars.name: Tabu,Atul Kulkarni,Rajpal Yadav,Ananya Khare,Vishal Thakkar,Minakshi Sahani

title: Yeh Raaste Hai Pyaar Ke
synopsis: When Rohit, Vicky's look-alike, is accidentally killed by Bhanwarlal, Vicky impersonates Rohit and stays with his family. Little does he know that his father already knows about Rohit's death.

title: Hate Story
synopsis: Hate Story, directed by Vikram Bhatt is an erotic thriller about Kaavya and her transformation from a simple middle class journalist to a sex worker to seek revenge.

title: God Tussi Great Ho
synopsis: Arun complains and holds God responsible for all problems in his life. God appears before him and grants him divine powers. Arun thinks he can make the world a better place by granting all wishes.

title: Indu Sarkar
synopsis: During the Emergency, Indu's husband, a government employee, plans to use the situation to his advantage and move ahead in his career. However, Indu's sense of morality sets her on a different path.

title: Lakeer - Forbidden Lines
synopsis: Arjun, a powerful man, has a spoilt brother, Karan, who uses his status to full advantage. Sanju is a mechanic and his brother, Saahil, loves Bindiya. Trouble ensues when Karan also falls for Bindiya.

stars.name: Sunny DeolSunil ShettyJohn AbrahamSohail KhanNauheed CyrusiApoorva Agnihotri

title: Chehraa
synopsis: A girl falls in love with a psychiatrist, but soon their relationship is soured, courtesy a woman with a dubious past.

title: Mr Ya Miss
synopsis: Casanova Sanjay Patel lands himself in trouble when he is killed by his girlfriends for his flirtatious actions. Mayhem ensues when he returns to Earth as a girl this time.

title: Apne
synopsis: A wrecked boxer turns to his sons to win the glory that eluded him in the ring. But when his younger son is injured in the ring, the elder one decides to fulfil his father's dream.

title: Hulchul
synopsis: Anjali and Jai belong to two feuding families and pretend to be in love only for revenge. However, their plan goes awry when they really fall in love and must work on bringing together their families.

stars.name: Akshaye Khanna,Amrish Puri,Kareena Kapoor,Arshad Warsi,Sunil Shetty,Jackie Shroff,Arbaaz Khan,Paresh Rawal

synopsis: After forsaking his family and religion, a husband finds his wife is demoniacally possessed.

title: Dirty Politics
synopsis: Dirty Politics investigates the sensational affair between a dancer and a powerful politician. When their relationship is exposed in public, it causes a big scandal that threatens the entire government

title: Alone
synopsis: Sanjana is madly in love with Kabir. All she wants is his uninterrupted time. Trouble is, her conjoined twin Anjana also desires exactly the same. Who will sacrifice?

title: Ho Javey Je Pyaar
synopsis: A young and beautiful 19 year old Gurnoor and a rich, smart & handsome 20 year old Sartaj.

stars.name: Feroza Kaur Heer,Zorawar Singh,Anita Meet,Bhotu Shah,Surender Sharma

title: Myself Pendu
synopsis: Preet and Harpal are brothers who lead laid-back lives and make schemes of making themselves rich. Events take a turn when they meet 2 richn girls and decide to get involved with them for money, but finally decide to get married to them.

stars.name: Preet Harpal, Sayali Bhagat and Ather Habib

title: Marriage Da Garriage
synopsis: 2 prisoners conme out of jail and decide to start a new crime free life and decide to start a wedding planning business. Here Raj who is in love with Simran and wants an extremely filmy marriage goes to these new wedding planners.

stars.name: Navraj Hans,Jaswinder Bhalla,B.N Sharma,Upasana Singh,Shakti Kapoor

title: Lagda Ishq Ho Gaya
synopsis: Love is the air for Prince who finds his soulmate in Raavi. But as fate would have it, they are separted and have to fight against their destiny to be with each other.

title: Jugaadi Dot Com
synopsis: This is a story of what happens when a con Baba, a con director and a hacker come together and start a website called 'Jugaadi Dot Com'.

title: Dil Pardesi Ho Gaya
synopsis: Major Ram, from the Indian Army, is held captive in Pakistan after a war. His brother Sunny, takes upon himself to save him. He lands up in Pakistan and meets Rukhsar. Rukhsar is daughter of a Pakistani brigadier.

stars.name: Inderjit Nikku,Sana Nawaz Khan,Daljeet Kaur,Shakti Kapoor,Raza Murad

title: Burrraahh
synopsis: A group of college boys compete in the national folk dance festival to save their college.

title: Yaaran Da Katchup
synopsis: Three friends, Hardy Gill, Arjun Singh and Fateh King, plan to catch up with each other. However, things do not go as planned.

title: Yoddha
synopsis: Yoddha is based on the life of a simple person, but circumstances turn him into a warrior who fights against the atrocities of the establishment and its agents.

title: Yaara Da Yaar Punjabi Assi Haan Yaar Punjabi
synopsis: Love stories that start from campus end up in a cold blooded fight. It is a sweet tale of campus love stories as well as fight for love. Will love triumph over evil ploys?

title: Vaisakhi List
synopsis: This film is about two prisoners who make a master plan to escape the prison. They escape the prison on Vaisakhi Day and in few hours of they see the Vaisakhi list made by the government in which they were to be pardoned by the Jail minister.

title: Saadi Wakhri Hai Shaan
synopsis: The movie covers every aspect of the true Punjabi life. It outlines the grandeur, exuberance, family values, traits and overall zest for life of Punjabis.

title: Proud To Be A Sikh
synopsis: A Gursikh professor meets six youth who are ashamed of their religion. He tries to educate them about their rich heritage and encourages them to be proud of an important aspect of their identity.

title: Dramebaaz Kalakaar
synopsis: 3 boys, one dream – To become a Superstar! In their quest to achieve their ticket to stardom, they try all the tricks in the book, only to fail hilariously. It’s then when it strikes them, they need to achieve much more to become the ultimate ‘Dramebaaz Kalakaar'.

title: Fugly
synopsis: Four fun-loving friends find themselves in the grip of a vicious, crooked cop - how fugly will this get?

title: 3 AM: The Hour of the Dead
synopsis: After the mysterious death of his girlfriend at the haunted Rudra Mills, a reality TV host and his friends venture into the forbidden land to determine whether ghosts exist.

title: Maachis
synopsis: 'Maachis' is a true story inspired by the 1984 Sikh riots after the assassination of Indira Gandhi, the PM of India.

title: Howrah Bridge
synopsis: Howrah Bridge is about the journey of Rakesh who is all set to find the murderers of his brother, Madan in Calcutta.

title: Bhoot Bungla
synopsis: Mystery surrounds a mansion which is reportedly haunted and a young man along with its heiress decides to investigate the hidden secrets.

title: Padosan
synopsis: A comedy about two a man and a woman from different backgrounds who fall in love. Featuring classic hit songs, including the unforgettable Mere Samne Wali Khidki Mein', Ek Chatur Naar' and Meri Pyari Bindu'.

title: An Evening In Paris
synopsis: Mystery and intrigue surround the romance of Sam and Deepa in Paris in this evergreen classic starring Shammi Kapoor and Sharmila Tagore.

title: Aradhana
synopsis: Rajesh Khanna plays a dashing Indian air force pilot who is killed in a plane crash but returns to play the son he fathered with Sharmila Tagore.

title: Bombay To Goa
synopsis: A remake of the Tamil hit, Madras to Pondicherry. A woman boards a bus to Goa to escape from a gang of armed men. She meets a colourful group of passengers and a tall, handsome stranger.

title: Kashmir Ki Kali
synopsis: A young but rich business tycoon Rajeev Lal (Shammi Kapoor) escapes to Kashmir to avoid marriage but promptly falls in love with a flower seller, Champa (Sharmila Tagore).

title: Amar Prem
synopsis: Amar Prem is the story of three innocent souls, who by destiny reach each other and are bound by eternal love.

title: Chitchor
synopsis: Vinod falls in love with Geeta after her family mistakes him for someone else but when true identities are revealed, Vinod risk's losing his love.

title: Kati Patang
synopsis: Kati Patang is the story of Madhavi (Asha Parekh) whose life is like a kite whose string is cut off from the base.

title: Khatta Meetha
synopsis: Chaos ensues when a factory worker with 4 sons marries a middle aged woman with 2 sons and a daughter.

title: Chashme Buddoor
synopsis: Two womanisers are surprised when their nerdy friend wins a beautiful girl's heart. They then set into motion a wild and devious plot to break the lovebirds apart.

title: Saaransh
synopsis: A retired school teacher and his wife come to terms with life after the death of their only son in a senseless mugging incident on the mean streets of New York.

title: Maine Pyaar Kiya
synopsis: Prem and Suman, from different social backgrounds, run into each other and fall in love. However, social prejudice comes in the way of their love.

title: Hum Saath Saath Hain
synopsis: Ramkishen and Mamta dream of keeping their extended family together. But when problems arise, Ramkishen is stunned to find out that his family too is susceptible to the corrosion of values that have been inculcated into them.

title: Hum Aapke Hain Koun
synopsis: A beautiful love story about Prem and Nisha and the hurdles they need to face for their family's happiness.

title: Main Prem Ki Diwani Hoon
synopsis: After charming his way into winning Sanjana's heart, Prem is faced with having to compete against another man, also called Prem, to get Sanjana to marry him.

title: Vivah
synopsis: Poonam, a conventional young woman is to marry Prem when an accident occurs and puts Poonam in a dire situation.

title: Ek Vivah Aisa Bhi
synopsis: An incredible love story about Chandni and Sonu who come from different social backgrounds.

title: Mantostaan
synopsis: Mantostaan sheds light on the inhumane side of mankind covering four controversial stories of the legendary urdu Writer Saadat Hassan Manto.

title: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
synopsis: While recovering from an assassination attempt four days before his coronation, a stern prince is replaced by a heartfelt lookalike.

title: Dongri Ka Raja
synopsis: Two lovers fall into a passionate love affair in the underworld.

title: Ik Onkar
synopsis: Ik Onkar - The Revolution throws light on a few dark pages of Punjab and the storyline aims to awaken young minds to stand strong against the notorious factors of society. It also showcases the outrageous courage of a Sikh young man who raises his voice against the evils.

title: Kirdar - E - Sardar
synopsis: Kirdar - E - Sardar is the story of a Punjabi boxer who struggles with the drug addiction problems in Punjab. He goes on to prove the power of Khalsa even in the modern day and age.

title: Mantra
synopsis: Mantra tells the story of a businessman Kapil Kapoor and his family in the backdrop of changing India in the first decade of the new millennium.

title: Born To Be King
synopsis: Balraj comes back to Punjab after being caught in a life-threatening situation in London involving drug abuse, only to find that things here too are somewhat similar.

title: Shaurya
synopsis: A soldier is court-martialed for killing a Major. However, he remains unvoiced on the charge as it could destroy the sanctity of his profession. Can his aloof lawyer save him?

title: Maatr
synopsis: After her daughter Tia gets killed, Vidya is shattered. She decides to punish her murderer and fights for justice.

title: Sankat City
synopsis: Guru and Ganpat, two small-time thieves, steal a Mercedes car with a bag containing INR 1 crore. When Guru tries to sell the car, a customer recognises it and informs the real owner, a gangster.

title: Fool N Final
synopsis: A diamond worth a billion dollars has been stolen, and many gangs have their eyes on it. They try to outsmart each other in order to get hold of the diamond.

title: Teri Meherbaniyan
synopsis: Ram and Bijli fall in love with each other, but there are people in the village who don't want Ram to stay and plot against him.

title: Dangar Doctor Jelly
synopsis: Welcome to the world of Dangar Doctor Jelly where chaos reigns when Ravinder Grewal's in-laws pay him a visit at his house. What follows next is utter confusion and a laugh riot.

title: Hero Hyderabadi
synopsis: Hero Hyderabadi is a comedy drama starring Adnan Sajid Khan, Priti Nigam, Chitram Basha, Ahsan Khan and directed by Anand Kodavatiganti.

title: Stepeny 2 Returns
synopsis: Stepney 2 Returns is a romantic comedy movie starring Adnan Sajid Khan, Pentali Sen, Akbar Bin Tabar and directed by Sarhad Reddy.

title: Shaadi Express
synopsis: A romantic comedy starring Mast Ali, Aziz Naser, Altaf Hyder and directed by Sanjay Punjabi.

title: Hyderabadi Nawabs
synopsis: Munna and Pappu are two best friends who are in love with Reshma and Najma respectively. Their lives are going smooth until the girls' father Hanif decides to marry them off to NRI Indians.

title: Meri Do Dulhan
synopsis: Meri Do Dulhan is a Hindi movie starring Shahrukh Habeeb, Gullu Dada ,Akbar Bin Tabar and Hakeem Aziz in prominent roles. The cast also includes Mamtha Chaudhari and Meenakshi. It is a romance thriller directed by Minu Khan

title: Salaam Zindagi
synopsis: Imran and Irfan think that going to USA with Usman Bhai will solve all their problems. But little do they know that in the States a gangster named Tony is waiting to attack them.

title: Fun Aur Masti
synopsis: Hussain and Johnny become best friends when Hussain moves to Hyderabad. They also have a common problem, a local goon Gullu, who gives them a hard time. Will they be able to teach him a lesson?

title: Kaabil
synopsis: A blind man seeks revenge against a corrupt politician and his brother after his wife is raped and killed.

title: Haseena Parkar
synopsis: Haseena is very close to her brother Dawood, who turns to a life of crime and rises to power in the Mumbai underworld. After the bomb blasts of 1993, Dawood escapes to Dubai and she falls in trouble.

title: Revolver Rani
synopsis: In a quirky twist of fate, Chambal's outlandish outlaw falls in love with a wannabe actor. Will she surrender her sensational sins for love?

title: Hunn Pateela Kharrkega
synopsis: Sandeep Pateela belongs to a rich family and is son of Harpal Chora. Although he is very rich but his only desire in life is to live like ordinary people which makes his father mad. He decides to stand against his father's will and claims to become poor in 30 days by spending all his fortune. How he spends all the money makes this movie a fun watch.

title: Saka - The Martyrs of Nankana Sahib
synopsis: Saka - The Martyrs of Nankana Sahib is a Punjabi historical film about 1921 Nankana Sahib massacre directed and written by Jagmeet Singh Samundri, starring Mukul Dev, Aman Dhaliwal, Oshin Brar.

title: Rang Rasiya
synopsis: A look into the life of 19th century Indian painter Raja Ravi Varma.

title: Machine
synopsis: Racing enthusiasts Sarah and Ransh fall in love and get married after the two bond post her lover's death. But Ransh deliberately pushes her off a cliff one day and claims her wealth and property.

title: Ittefaq
synopsis: An acclaimed writer and a young homemaker become the prime suspects in a double murder. Police officer Dev must figure out who's telling the truth when both offer conflicting stories about the events of that fateful night.

title: Kahaani 2
synopsis: Vidya lives in a small town with Minnie, a girl with paralysis. When someone kidnaps Minnie, Vidya tries to save her, but she meets with an accident on the way, landing herself in a hospital.

title: Do Lafzon Ki Kahani
synopsis: A budding relationship between Sooraj, a boxer with an awful past, and Jenny, a girl with visual impairment, experiences challenges after they discover each other's pasts.

title: Sweetiee Weds NRI
synopsis: Sweetiee Desai, a young woman from Gujarat, lives in the lap of luxury. Her father has only one dream, to get her married to an NRI.

title: Chhupa Rustam
synopsis: Nirmal thinks that his father died in a car accident but doesn't know the whole truth. He meets Satpal, a man who knows the truth but is currently confined to a mental institution.

title: Satta
synopsis: Anuradha Sehgal is forced into politics when her husband Vivek lands up in jail. As a result, her simple life is now peppered with several struggles.

title: Jab Pyaar Kisise Hota Hai
synopsis: A playboy falls in love with a girl who rejects him because of his vices. She gives him time to change. When he changes his lifestyle, a little boy shows up claiming to be his son.

title: Kachche Dhaage
synopsis: When Jay meets his stepbrother Aftab and stepmother Mariam, he develops an immediate hatred for them. However, he agrees to help Aftab to rescue Mariam after she is kidnapped.

title: Dillagi
synopsis: Shalini falls in love with Rajvir, but he breaks her heart. Later, he realises his mistake, but it is too late as she is getting married and things take an unexpected turn.

title: Barsaat
synopsis: Arav, an ambitious automobile designer, travels to the US to seek better opportunities. There, he meets Anna, whose grandfather offers Arav to work with him for automobile giants, BMW.

title: Aa Ab Laut Chale
synopsis: An ambitious, unemployed youth goes to the US to find a job and gets caught in a love triangle. On one side is an equally unlucky girl and on the other is a rich girl who can help him find employment.

title: Inquilaab
synopsis: A politician helps a jobless man to become a police officer and then uses him for his nefarious activities. His wife finds out he is being used as a pawn and tries to prevent him from becoming one.

title: Ram Teri Ganga Maili
synopsis: When Ganga's husband abandons her, she sets out on a journey to Calcutta to find him and ensure her son has a better future. But she is cheated and forced to work in a brothel.

title: Kaagaz Ke Fools
synopsis: Purushottam Tripathi, who abandons his wife Nikki, witnesses a drastic change in his life after he starts staying with Rubina, a prostitute.

title: Karam
synopsis: An assassin, filled with remorse after killing an entire family, decides to quit and lead a normal life. However, his boss holds his wife hostage and compels him to do his bidding for the last time.

title: Golmaal Returns
synopsis: A man creates a fictitious character as his friend to convince his suspicious wife that he is not having an affair, setting off a chain of hilarious events.

title: Prem Granth
synopsis: Somen and Kajri fall in love with each other and wish to get married. Things, however, take an ugly turn when Kajri gets raped and is forced to flee thereafter.

title: Dulhe Raja
synopsis: K. K. Singhania is shocked to find out that Raja, his enemy, has started a dhaba in the vicinity of his luxurious hotel. He is annoyed when his daughter Kiran decides to get married to Raja.

title: Deewane (2000)
synopsis: When police officer Vishal gets shot, his lookalike is sent to take his place at home. What happens when Vishals girlfriend Sapna falls in love with the new, and unfortunately, wrong Vishal?

title: Bichhoo
synopsis: Jeeva, a professional assassin, falls in love with his neighbour's daughter Kiran and helps her avenge the murder of her family by a ruthless gang of criminals.

title: Namak Halaal
synopsis: With a view to seek independence, Arjun relocates to Mumbai and starts working as a singer in a hotel. After a series of problems he learns the bitter truth of life. Watch how he cops up with his new life.

title: Aflatoon
synopsis: Trouble ensues when Raja is framed for crimes that actually committed by his evil lookalike Rocky, and the former must prove his innocence and eliminate his nemesis.

title: Jaan - E - Mann - Let's Fall In Love Again
synopsis: Jaan-e-mann is about a couple Suhaan and Piya who elope to get married to each other. Suhaan aspires to become a superstar and his career aspirations force him to stay away from Piya. Piya leaves him thinking she would become an obstacle for his career.

title: Chhote Sarkar
synopsis: Amar, a businessman, is framed by two undercover police officers, Seema and Jagmohan, for the murder of his uncle. He then pretends to be mentally unstable.

title: Main Aisa Hi Hoon
synopsis: Indraneel, an autistic single father, lives with his daughter, Gungun. When Gungun's grandfather comes to claim her custody, Indraneel must prove to the court that he can take care of his daughter.

title: Mera Pehla Pehla Pyar
synopsis: Rohan and Ayesha are a couple but their relationship turns sour due to rumours that they are dating different people. They decide to part ways, only to realise that they are making a mistake.

title: Professor Pyarelal
synopsis: Upon his wife and son's insistence, a man decides to give up all his criminal activities and start life anew. But one last job that he pulls off changes his life forever.

title: Satyam Shivam Sundaram
synopsis: Rajeev falls in love with the melodious Rupa, not knowing that half her face is disfigured. But after their marriage, he abandons her after seeing her face, believing that she is not the one he loves.

title: Jis Desh Mein Ganga Behti Hai
synopsis: Raju informs the police about a group of bandits, even though he is in love with the chief's daughter. The police set out to kill the clan and it is upto him to save the bandits and his love.

title: Jhumroo
synopsis: Anjana, a young woman, falls in love with Jhumroo when she returns home after a long furlough. However, their blissful relationship is thwarted by her father's firm disagreement of their alliance.

title: Hera Pheri (1976)
synopsis: Vijay and Ajay make a living by conning people. Their friendship is affected when Vijay discovers that Ajay's father may have been his father's killer.

title: Henna
synopsis: A man on his way to wed to his lover meets with an accident, falls into the river, and is swept from India into Pakistan. He's nursed back to health but looses his memory and almost weds his saviour.

title: Guddu Ki Gun
synopsis: A washing powder salesman, Guddu, finds himself in a quandary when his girlfriend's grandfather casts a spell on him after he two-times her. Guddu must find true love in order to get rid of the curse.

title: Ghulam E Mustafa
synopsis: Adhering to the orders of his boss, Mustafa goes to live with a family who refuses to sell their house to his boss. Little does he know that this will change his life forever.

title: Power Cut
synopsis: A satire on the dismal power situation in the state of Punjab and the working of the Punjab State Power Corporation Limited.

title: Mahaul Theek Hai
synopsis: A couple is tantalized by a corrupt police superintendent who misuses his authority to threaten people. While trying to cope with the situations, they find themselves entangled in a web of deception.

title: Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro
synopsis: Two photographers, who are employed by a newspaper editor to expose the scandalous activities of the rich, come across corruption by a builder and accidentally photograph a murder.

title: Qayamat - City Under Threat
synopsis: CBI officer Akram seeks to nab three terrorists, Ali, Abbas and Laila, who have held 213 tourists as hostage in Elphinstone Jail. For this, he seeks help from Rachit, a former associate of the trio.

title: Shahenshah
synopsis: Vijay leads a dual life of a corrupt cop by day and crime buster by night. He makes life miserable for the evil forces who he wishes to seek revenge for his father's death.

title: Mumbai Central
synopsis: Gauri, a poor girl, falls in love with Rohit, who promises her employment in Mumbai. However, fate has something else in store for her when she visits the city.

title: Mera Naam Joker
synopsis: Throughout childhood, Raju faces many hurdles and disappointments in matters of the heart. But as a clown in a circus, he must make his audience laugh at the cost of his own sorrows.

title: Mahaan
synopsis: A lawyer goes into hiding after being falsely accused of committing a crime, while his wife gives birth to twins. Years later, fate reunites the family under difficult circumstances.

title: Koshish
synopsis: Haricharan and Aarti, a couple with hearing and speech impairment, face many difficulties in their lives. When Aarti dies, Haricharan raises their son Amit singlehandedly.

title: Anari (1959)
synopsis: After his landlady dies consuming a medicine manufactured by his owner, Ram falls into trouble. The police treat him as the prime suspect and imprison him.

title: Bhindi Baazar INC.
synopsis: Childhood friends Tez and Fateh are associated with a powerful gangster, Mamu. However, their friendship goes through a rough patch after the unexpected death of Mamu.

title: Chalti Ka Naam Gaadi
synopsis: A misunderstanding leads Brijmohan to deem that his love Kamini had deserted him for a wealthier man, making him hate women. When two women start dating his two younger brothers, they fear his fury.

title: Bumm Bumm Bole
synopsis: Two siblings decide to share a pair of shoes till their father can afford to buy another. But things look bleak when their father is unable to find a job and is also suspected of criminal offences.

title: Gol Maal (1979)
synopsis: Ramprasad works for a company owned by Bhavani Shankar, a quirky man who discourages his employees from pursuing any hobbies. When Bhavani catches him at a hockey match, he lies about having a twin.

title: Aa Gaye Munde U.K. De
synopsis: Roop falls madly in love with Disha the moment he sees her. He learns that Disha's father wants an NRI husband for her. So Roop pretends to have returned from the UK and woos her and her family.

title: Bobby
synopsis: Raja, an 18-year-old son of a rich Hindu businessman, falls in love with 16-year-old Bobby, a poor Catholic. They must defend their love even as their families try to keep them away from each other.

title: John Day
synopsis: John Day, a bank manager, and his wife Maria lose their daughter to an accidental forest fire causing Maria to rarely open up to people. One day, a courier boy enters the house and kidnaps her.

title: Disco Dancer
synopsis: Anil's mother is falsely accused of theft and jailed. Anil swears to set this right one day. Years later, he becomes a big star and restores his mother's honour. Now his fame earns him more enemies.

title: Global Baba
synopsis: Pehelwan, a criminal, escapes from a police encounter and disguises himself as a baba. He then uses his guise not only to amass followers but also to discreetly carry out his criminal activities.

title: Charlie Ke Chakkar Mein
synopsis: This is the story of what happens to four youngsters addicted to drugs who get involved in an accident concerning a gangster.

title: Bollywood Diaries
synopsis: A call-centre employer from Delhi, a government servant from Bhilai and a prostitute from Sonagachi, Kolkata, are aspiring actors and face struggles while trying to make it big in Bollywood.

title: Mili
synopsis: Shekhar is peeved with his neighbours until he meets Mili. After initial hatred, he eventually falls in love with her. Things take a turn when she realises she has only a few days left to live.

title: Sadma
synopsis: A man rescues from a brothel a grown up girl who behaves like a 6 year-old due to a brain injury. Weeks pass by as he cares and protects her from one and all. What will happen when her memory returns.

title: Masoom (1983)
synopsis: A family man whose everyday domestic life is turned upside down when he discovers that he has an illegitimate child from an past affair. When the boy's mother dies he is sent to live with his father.

title: Khubsoorat
synopsis: The authoritarian Nirmala runs her household with utmost strictness. But when Manju, her daughter-in-law's sister, comes to visit, chaos ensues.

title: Hum Kisi Se Kum Nahin
synopsis: Kajal, an affluent girl, comes across her estranged childhood lover Manjeet and decides to marry him. Everything is hunky-dory until she discovers that Manjeet has devised a plan to kidnap her.

title: Guddi
synopsis: Kusum, a schoolgirl, is infatuated with film star Dharmendra and is unable to differentiate between movies and real life. In order to make her understand, her uncle contacts him.

title: Ghayal
synopsis: Drug lord Balwant Rai frames Ajay for his elder brother's murder. Ajay then, in jail, befriends three kind-hearted convicts, who help him escape and take revenge on Balwant Rai.

title: Chupke Chupke
synopsis: Sulekha is in awe of her brother-in-law Raghav for his intelligence. Parimal, her husband, decides to take up the challenge of fooling Raghav and goes to work for him as a driver.

title: Bawarchi
synopsis: Desperate for a cook, the disgruntled Sharmas are relieved when the multi-talented Raghu takes up the job. Just as all is bliss, the family jewels disappear and so does Raghu.

title: Soldier
synopsis: To bust an illegal Indian syndicate, an undercover policeman romances an arms dealer's daughter.

title: Ishq Vishk
synopsis: Rajiv and Payal are best friends since school and Payal is secretly in love with him. But Rajiv behaves badly with her and breaks her heart. Watch what happends when a new girl Alisha comes to college and tries to woo Rajiv.

title: Big Brother
synopsis: Set in modern India about a small middle class family. Although they lead a simple and peaceful lifestyle, an incident occurs that changes their lives forever.

title: Satte Pe Satta
synopsis: Ravi, the eldest of seven brothers, marries Indu who teaches the siblings basic etiquette. Later, Ravi is abducted and is replaced by his lookalike who has murder on his mind.

title: Sardar Saab
synopsis: Daljeet and Mahek are in love with each other. Soon they get married and Daljeet goes to New Zealand. Around the same time, Sardar Saab is killed in a bomb blast and Daljeet decides to avenge his father.

title: Jab We Met
synopsis: A lively girl Geet transforms Aditya by giving a different perspective towards life. He then has to do the same for her.

title: Rabb Da Radio
synopsis: All hell breaks loose when a rich boy falls in love with Naseeb's cousin Guddi and asks for her hand in marriage. Will Naseeb be able to sort things out with her mother-in-law?

title: Saare Jahaan Se Mehnga
synopsis: The story is about a middle class family trying to cop up with inflation. This film is a hilarious journey of this family battling issues culminating into a climax that brings tears into your eyes.

title: Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani
synopsis: The wacky adventures of a young man who is willing to sacrifice his own love to insure the happiness of others, and get the girl-of-his-dreams married to the boy-of-her-dreams.

title: Khel To Abb Shuru Hoga
synopsis: A bank security guard Abbas (Ruslaan) ploys to loot his own bank with a little help from his allies. The robbery doesn't end well and he must fight to save the love of his life.

title: Judwaa
synopsis: Twin brothers Raja and Prem are separated at birth after their father exposes a kingpin and his racket. They eventually come together to battle a smuggling ring and save their family from certain doom.

title: Yaar Annmulle 2
synopsis: Sequel of the 2011 Punjabi blockbuster movie Yaar Annmulle.

title: Krazzy Tabbar
synopsis: An engaged couple appear to be destined for happiness, until their two families meet and the fireworks begin.

title: Jab Harry Met Sejal
synopsis: Sejal Zaveri is a good girl and Harry Singh Nehra is a cheap womaniser. When Sejal loses her engagement ring, Harry being her tour guide reluctantly agrees to help her find it. But as different as they are will they find the ring together? Will Sejal and Harry finally become friends?

title: Great Sardaar
synopsis: When Saint teams up with corrupt politicians to unleash atrocities on innocents, a Sikh leader rises to fight for his people.

title: Shree
synopsis: Shree trades in 12 hours of his life for a scientific experiment but finds himself accused of multiple murders and on the run to prove his innocence.

title: The President Is Coming
synopsis: The President of United States is coming to India. Along with all the political meetings he is going to meet young people, who will be the face of 'New India'.

title: Romeo Ranjha
synopsis: Two young men, Romeo and Ranjha, travel from India to Thailand in order to get famous and earn money. They however end up cheating the local mafia leader and rob him.

title: Kacche Dhaagey
synopsis: Meet and Rani are two star crossed lovers facing the brunt of their warring families

title: D-Day
synopsis:
A thriller set in India and Pakistan about three secret agents and an ex-army soldier who enter 
Pakistan to capture the terrorist Iqbal Seth (Goldman) and bring him to India.

title: Teshan
synopsis: After falling for Jinni, Teshan has just realised that being in love is not a bed of roses.

title: Bhouri
synopsis: Set against the background of the plight of a women in rural India, Bhouri is the story of a 22 year old woman whose fair complexion and sharp features became painful.

title: Mickey Virus
synopsis: A comedy about a gang of hackers, led by the notorious Mickey Arora aka Mickey Virus, who embezzle 100 crore while helping police investigate a cyber crime case.

title: Phas Gaye Re Obama
synopsis: A bankrupt Om returns to India and decides to sell his ancestral house in order to pay off his debts. His plans, however, go for a toss when he gets kidnapped by an underworld gang.

title: Eh Janam Tumhare Lekhe
synopsis: Bhagat Puran Singh, a humble and simple man, chooses a life full of difficulties in order to achieve his noble mission and later becomes a great writer, environmentalist and a philanthropist.

title: Darra
synopsis: Darra is the story of three brothers living in a village, where local politics snatches away their harmony and amity.

title: Gelo
synopsis: A working-class Punjabi woman battles the adverse conditions that farm laborers face, including an oppressive upper class and drug abuse.

title: Coffee With D
synopsis: A top journalist gets the opportunity of his life as he bags the first ever interview with the most dreaded don, D.

title: Punjab 1984
synopsis: During the anti-Sikh wars in 1984, Shiva loses his father in a crossfire attack. Over a land dispute, one of Shiva's relatives conspires with the local police and gets Shiva imprisoned.

title: Sardaarji
synopsis: Jaggi is an expert ghost buster in India. But, his life takes a huge turn when he is called to London bust a ghost named Pinky.

title: Sardaarji 2
synopsis: A short-tempered farmer exiled in Australia must raise a large sum of money before he can return to his village.

title: Jo Bole So Nihaal
synopsis: For Nihaal Singh, a constable from Punjab, life changes forever when he meets Romeo, a mercenary and terrorist. Nihaal is branded a traitor, suspended from his job and his future is in question.

title: Ziddi
synopsis: Police find Deva, a short-tempered man, guilty of his brother and sister's murder. Deva abducts the Chief Minister in order to unravel the mystery behind the crime.

title: Gali Gali Chor Hai
synopsis: A common man's fight against the ongoing corruption in his country.

title: Jodi Breakers
synopsis: Sid and Sonali take on assignments of splitting married couples who are caught in an unhappy marriage. All hell breaks loose when they unknowingly jeopardise the life of one of their clients.

title: Coolie No. 1
synopsis: Raju, a coolie who is pretending to be a millionaire falls in love with Malti. Malti is the daughter of Hoshiyar Chand who wants to marry her to a very rich guy. Will Hoshiyar Chand find out that Raju is actually a coolie? What will Raju do then?

title: Dulhan Hum Le Jayenge
synopsis: Raja after seeing Sapna's photograph wants to make her his bride. On a Europe trip the two fall in love, but first Raja has to convince Sapna's three unles for the marriage.

title: Tumko Na Bhool Paayenge
synopsis: Veer is about to get married to Muskaan his love, when some goons attack him. He later comes to know that he is not Veer. But why did the goons want to kill him? What is his real identity?

title: Ishq
synopsis: While their fathers are planning their marriage witheach other, Madhu and Ajay have fallen in love with Raja and Kajol respectively. But what will happen when their father's come to know?

title: Bade Miyan Chote Miyan
synopsis: Two rival cops come together to fight their lookalikes who commit crimes posing as them.

title: Arjun Pandit
synopsis: Arjun becomes a pawn in the hands of a powerful man and keeps mum on a crime he witnessed. He falls in love with Nisha only to turn into a ruthless gangster after being betrayed by her.

title: Biwi No. 1
synopsis: A housewife learns that her husband is cheating on her. Thus, her quest to bring him back begins.

title: Hero No. 1
synopsis: Rajesh pretends to be Meena's family servant just to get closer to them and win her hand in marriage.

title: Kya Dilli Kya Lahore
synopsis: In 1948, a cross-fire erupts at an isolated stretch of Indo-Pak border, leaving only two soldiers alive. One is an Indian soldier of Pakistani origin while the other is a Pakistani soldier of Indian origin.

title: Double Di Trouble
synopsis: Ajit and his son Fateh have to Chandigarh for a court and realise that their look alikes live there. Meanwhile Manjit, Ajit's look alike has had a fight with his wife and vows to go home only when he has bought her a diamond ring.

title: Apaharan
synopsis: Ajay, an aspiring cop borrows Rs. 5 lakh from a money-lender to pursue his dream. When he is unable to repay the loan on time, he decides to be a part of a kidnapping scheme.

title: Mujhe Kucch Kehna Hai
synopsis: An accident brings Karan and Pooja close to each other. When Karan finally decides to propose to her, he learns that destiny has other plans.

title: Dhaai Akshar Prem Ke
synopsis: Karan is an army captain who finds himself torn between Nisha, the woman he loves, and Sahiba, the woman whom he decides to help during a train journey.

title: Shaadi No 1
synopsis: Three men are perpetually seeking adventure outside their marriage and cheating on their respective wives. However, there is someone who is hell-bent on foiling their plans each time.

title: Out Of Control
synopsis: A man is caught between two wives when he secretly marries an American for a visa and another Indian village girl due to family pressure. He faces a moral dilemma when the truth is out.

title: Om Jai Jagadish
synopsis: Three brothers must come together to try and salvage what they can of their family business and estate. But, can they overcome their own selfish motives and commitments in order to do so?

title: Mirzya
synopsis: A horse groom reconnects with his childhood love, but she is engaged to marry the local prince.

title: Rehnaa Hai Terre Dil Mein
synopsis: Madhav impersonates Rajiv to get close to Reena. But, Reena faces a crisis of conscience when the real Rajiv comes to India and Madhav's false identity is unveiled.

title: 31st October
synopsis: In 1984, a family fights against the odds to survive the carnage inflicted on Sikhs.

title: Makkhi
synopsis: Nani and Bindu love each other, but Nani is killed by a jealous Sudeep who also loves Bindu. But soon, Bindu realises that Nani has re-incarnated as a fly.

title: Machhli Jal Ki Rani Hai
synopsis: Ayesha and Uday are face bizzare incidents and presence of a paranormal being when they move to Jabalpur.

title: Veerappan
synopsis: The film is based on the real-life Indian bandit Veerappan and the events leading to Operation Cocoon, a mission to capture and kill him.

title: Dark Chocolate
synopsis: Rina Bardhan has been murdered. The police arrests her mother Ishaani Banerjee and step father Shadab Kapoor. But can a mother kill her own daughter? Does having a bad past justify murder?

title: Kabali
synopsis: Kabali fights against the oppression faced by the Tamils working in Malaysia as labourers. However, he is jailed for twenty-five years and once released, he sets out to seek his revenge.

title: Beiimaan Love
synopsis: Raj bets his friend that he can make Sunaina fall for him in 10 days. Little does he know that this bet will leave him ravaged.

title: Oh Yaara Ainvayi Ainvayi Lut Gaya
synopsis: The film is a story of the love-hate relationship of a couple who file for divorce and after going out of their way to trouble their partner, they finally realise their love for each other.

title: Wake Up Singh
synopsis: A righteous man takes on the illegal drug trade in Punjab to avenge the death of his friend.

title: Aatishbaazi Ishq
synopsis: Aatishbaazi Ishq is a story of 3 sports stars who play different sports and believe that they are the best in what they do and how a women changes their lives.

title: Fever
synopsis: Fever is about a contract killer who loses his memory in an accident. After which he wakes up knowing only his name and the company of a woman who wants to help this person to regain his identity.

title: Khanna and Iyer
synopsis: Aryan and Nandini, two fellow collegians, fall in love and elope when their parents disapprove of their relationship. However, they land in trouble when they are abducted by Donga, a terrorist.

title: Narsimha
synopsis: Narasimha, who belongs to a middle-class family, is devastated when his entire family is killed in a clash between two neighbourhoods. He takes to alcohol and crime and even moonlights as a hitman.

title: Baap Numbri Beta Dus Numbri
synopsis: A father and son duo are driving the city crazy, as they con anyone and everyone. They create laughter riots with their various encounters, but land themselves in real trouble when they cross the paths of a simple and righteous guy.

title: Mahal
synopsis: Rajesh is a driver-cum-assistant to a wealthy businessman in Kolkata.

title: CID
synopsis: Shrivastav, an editor, is murdered when he tries to expose a rich man's link with the underworld. However, his friend Shekhar tries to find the killer but himself gets framed in the plot.

title: Baaz
synopsis: General Barbosa has signed a treaty with the queen of a small state giving him trading rights. Soon he starts meddling with the administration and tries to capture the state.

title: Paying Guest
synopsis: An incompetent lawyer gets evicted, dons the guise of an old man to gain accommodation, falls for the owner's daughter, then faces numerous life-changing challenges.

title: Sahib Bibi aur Ghulam
synopsis: A wealthy man goes to brothels to satisfy his desires. This mentally disturbs his wife. Gradually, she finds solace in the arms of their neighbour Bhootnath.

title: Himmat
synopsis: Ajay and Abdul are secret agents. Ajay sets out to Switzerland on vacation and meets Anju. They fall in love with each other. Back in India, Abdul gets murdered. Ajay must solve the case.

title: Nagina
synopsis: Rajni and Rajiv live a happy married life until Bhairon Nath, a religious man who controls snakes, informs Rajiv's mother that Rajni is a shape-shifting snake. But he also has an evil, hidden agenda.

title: Ek Aur Ek Gyarah
synopsis: Tara and Sitara take shelter in Major Ram Singh's house and deceive him on the advice of Cobra, a gangster. However, when they realise that Cobra has kidnapped their mother, they confess the truth.

title: Damini
synopsis: Damini marries into a wealthy family and witnesses the housemaid being raped by her brother-in-law and his friends. Damini faces many obstacles as she tries to bring the culprits to justice.

title: Sapnay
synopsis: Thomas loves Priya from their high school days but is afraid to confess. So he resorts to his friend Deva, to convince Priya. However, a tricky situation arises when Priya falls in love with Deva.

title: Rishtey
synopsis: Suraj and Komal marry each other against the wish of her disapproving father. Soon after, Komal gives birth to a baby boy. However, she walks out of Suraj's life due to her father's misguidance.

title: Jogger's Park
synopsis: Jenny is a 30-year-old independent woman who loves herself. Her life turns upside down when a former judge falls in love with her.

title: Half Ticket
synopsis: When Vijay is forced by his father to get married, he leaves the house and decides to start a new life in Bombay. But he does not have enough money to buy the train ticket.

title: Socha Na Tha
synopsis: Viren and Aditi refuse an arranged marriage, which creates a rift between their families. But when their friendship turns into love, it leads to a lot of chaos since Viren also has a girlfriend.

title: Tezaab
synopsis: Mahesh's life is ruined after his parents are killed and he is jailed. He is separated from Mohini, who suffers due to her cruel father. Mahesh returns but only to save Mohini and settle old scores.

title: Action Replayy
synopsis: A son tries to revive his parents' lifeless marriage by travelling back in time to the 70s when their romance was budding. But to his surprise, this turns out to be more complex than he expected.

title: Armaan
synopsis: Armaan, a doctor, has to choose between his love for a colleague and marriage with a rich brat to get the money he needs to fulfil his late father's wish of building a hospital.

title: Kalicharan
synopsis: To catch a hardened criminal named Din Dayal, Inspector General P N Khanna asks Kalicharan, another criminal and the look-alike of a deceased cop, to assist him in arresting Din Dayal.

title: Chaudhvin Ka Chand
synopsis: Nawab sees Jameela in a market and instantly falls in love with her. However, the situation gets tricky when his close friend Aslam also likes the same girl.

title: Singh Is Kinng
synopsis: Happy, notoriously famous for his antics, is sent to fetch Lakhan so that he can meet his ailing father. But, in Australia, Happy ends up taking Lakhan's place as the king of the local underworld.

title: Black & White
synopsis: An Indian professor is unaware that his new friend is an Afghan terrorist who plans to kill himself and thousands of Indians with explosives during a holiday celebration.

title: Uchaa Pind
synopsis: Uchaa Pind is a 1994 Punjabi film directed by Sukhjinder Shera. It is considered among the great hits in the history of Punjabi cinema. It starred Raj Babber, Sukhjinder Shera, Preeti Sapru, Anil Sharma, B N Sharma and Surinder Sharma.

title: Namastey London
synopsis: Jasmeet's lifestyle includes partying and boyfriends, all to the dismay of her father. On a trip to India, she is married off to Arjun, who truly loves her. But for Jasmeet, the marriage has no value.

title: Andaz Apna Apna
synopsis: Amar and Prem belong to middle-class families but dream big. Gaiety ensues when they both vie to win over a multi-millionaire's daughter to become her heritor.

title: Hero Hitler In Love
synopsis: Story of a man named Hitler who is liked by everyone in his village until he marries a girl from Pakistan.

title: Jigariyaa
synopsis: Shaamu falls in love with Raadha at first sight. As they grow close to each other, destiny takes another turn.

title: Jatt Da Gandasa
synopsis: A widowed mother raises her sons in hopes of of avenging her husband's murder. But what happens when one of her sons falls in love with the said muderer's only daughter?

title: Kee Banu Duniya Daa
synopsis: A truck driver's son who goes on to become a famous singer quits it all to become a truck-driver to licate his father's murderers. Is he able to avenge the murder of his father is the story of the film.

stars.name: Daljit Kaur,Gurdas Mann,Manjit Mann,Mehar Mittal,Dara Singh,Surinder Shinda

title: Sutlej De Kande
synopsis: Satluj De Kande is a 1964 National Award winning Punjabi romantic film directed by M. M. Billoo Mehra and produced by Padam Prakash Maheshwary, starring Balraj Sahni and Nishi in lead roles.

title: Giddha
synopsis: Reshma's stepmother Ramkali wishes for her blind daughter to be married to Dr. Balbir. Destiny has other plans in store as Dr. Balbir and Reshma fall in love. Will Ramkali be able to break them up? Or will love win against all odds?

title: Putt Jattan De
synopsis: Putt Jattan De  is a 1981 Punjabi film produced by Devinder Singh Gill & Iqbal Dhillon and directed by Jagjit Gill. It is considered among the great hits in the history of Punjabi cinema.

title: Kankan De Ohle
synopsis: Everyone in the village is fond of Madan whose father is in prison. An evil money lender becomes a problem for the villagers who then seek the help of Madan. Will Madan fight for his people?

title: Risky Mundey
synopsis: This movie is based on the lives of 2 friends who are passionate about their lives. Theirs is a strong friendship where one can even take lives for the other. But things change when a mysterious murder takes place.

title: Ekam
synopsis: The film revolves around the present day problems in Punjab and how a boy who has come to his land after a long time fights to put things straight in his ancestral village in Punjab.

title: MLA Natha Singh
synopsis: MLA Natha Singh is a political satire using Punjab as a backdrop. It is a funny perspective on the political scenario in Punjab and has old style punjabi humor.

title: Teri Meri Ik Jindri
synopsis: Teri Meri Ik Jindri is the story of a rich, spoilt girl who falls in love and is completely changed. “The film addresses true love, which is non-existent in today’s generation and also faith that’s again becoming extinct.”

title: Veeran Naal Sardari
synopsis: Roop is brave while her brother Jujhar is a scared guy. Gary is a bully who is constantly behind Jujhar. But when he gets arrested he decides to take revenge and that changes everything.

stars.name: Harry Ahluwalia,Sapna thakur,Ria juj,Raziya Sukhbir,Gurchet Chitarkar

title: Chaudhary Karnail Singh
synopsis: What happens when a Sikh father who is also the village Sarpanch has to choose sides between his own son and a Muslim couple is the crux of the movie.

title: Badla Jatti Da
synopsis: This is the story of Gulabo Kaur who decides to avenge the slaughter of her entire family by forcing a marriage between her son and her neimises daughter.

title: Idiot Boys
synopsis: This is a story about how good-hearted guys under the wrong influences lose direction. Now stuck in a certain situation they end up doing idiotic things they would have never done.

title: Asa Nu Maan Watna Da
synopsis: Asa Nu Maan Watna Da revolves around Asians who return to their motherland after living abroad for most of their lives.

stars.name: Harbhajan Mann,Kimi Verma,Neeru Bajwa,Deep Dhillon,Gurpreet Guggi

title: Panjaban
synopsis: The story revolves around two sisters, Gurjot and Gurpreet, born and brought up in an affluent family. The situations that they become a part of due to their varying perspective, forms the crux of the story.

title: Oh My Pyo Ji
synopsis: The story revolves around a gangster who desperately wants his sons to take over his business.

title: Punjabian Da King
synopsis: A contract killer's life turns upside down when he falls in love with a girl whose father he has to kill.

title: Pyaar Na Manne Haar
synopsis: Love crosses all boundaries when an Indian boy falls in love with a Pakistni girl. What happens when he goes across the border to win his love is the crux of the film.

title: Ishq Brandy
synopsis: After an excessive drinking session, three friends, Gura, Teji and Pritam, are caught in a hilarious situation when they try to balance their respective romantic lives.

title: Cross Connection
synopsis: Cross Connection is a rib-tickling comedy that shows the increasing misunderstandings, generation gap, confusions and decreasing love and affection between parents and children and how it leads to becoming a big problem in their daily lives.

stars.name: Gary Waraich,Nancy Johal,B.N. Sharma,Upasna Singh,Gurchet Chitrakaar,Baagi Bhangu,Sumandeep Kaur,Tarsem Paul,Dr. Sahib Singh,Jasbir Dhillon

title: Ramta Jogi
synopsis: Meet, daughter of a wealthy businessman, falls in love with Jogi. They decide to travel to Mumbai since their families oppose the relationship. However, the couple faces several problems in the city.

title: Nabar
synopsis: Nabar, which means 'rebel without a cause', is a family drama that focuses on fly-by-night immigration operators misleading the naive youth in their lure to go abroad.

title: Buddha in a Traffic Jam
synopsis: The film delves into the relevance of socialism and capitalism in a poverty and corruption ridden India seeking to become a superpower.

title: Raula Pai Gaya
synopsis: This movie features lives of college students, who deal with the ups and downs in life in a very optimistic way.

title: Ronde Saare Vyah Picho

title: Cross Connection
synopsis: Cross Connection is a rib-tickling comedy that shows the increasing misunderstandings, generation gap, confusions and decreasing love and affection between parents and children and how it leads to becoming a big problem in their daily lives.

stars.name: Gary Waraich,Nancy Johal,B.N. Sharma,Upasna Singh,Gurchet Chitrakaar,Baagi Bhangu,Sumandeep Kaur,Tarsem Paul,Dr. Sahib Singh,Jasbir Dhillon

title: Idiot Boys
synopsis: This is a story about how good-hearted guys under the wrong influences lose direction. Now stuck in a certain situation they end up doing idiotic things they would have never done.

title: Double Di Trouble
synopsis: Ajit and his son Fateh have to Chandigarh for a court and realise that their look alikes live there. Meanwhile Manjit, Ajit's look alike has had a fight with his wife and vows to go home only when he has bought her a diamond ring.

title: Romeo Ranjha
synopsis: Two young men, Romeo and Ranjha, travel from India to Thailand in order to get famous and earn money. They however end up cheating the local mafia leader and rob him.

title: Proud To Be A Sikh
synopsis: A Gursikh professor meets six youth who are ashamed of their religion. He tries to educate them about their rich heritage and encourages them to be proud of an important aspect of their identity.

title: Yaaran Da Katchup
synopsis: Three friends, Hardy Gill, Arjun Singh and Fateh King, plan to catch up with each other. However, things do not go as planned.

title: Pyaar Na Manne Haar
synopsis: Love crosses all boundaries when an Indian boy falls in love with a Pakistni girl. What happens when he goes across the border to win his love is the crux of the film.

title: Hunn Pateela Kharrkega
synopsis: Sandeep Pateela belongs to a rich family and is son of Harpal Chora. Although he is very rich but his only desire in life is to live like ordinary people which makes his father mad. He decides to stand against his father's will and claims to become poor in 30 days by spending all his fortune. How he spends all the money makes this movie a fun watch.

title: Yaara Da Yaar Punjabi Assi Haan Yaar Punjabi
synopsis: Love stories that start from campus end up in a cold blooded fight. It is a sweet tale of campus love stories as well as fight for love. Will love triumph over evil ploys?

title: Ho Javey Je Pyaar
synopsis: A young and beautiful 19 year old Gurnoor and a rich, smart & handsome 20 year old Sartaj.

stars.name: Feroza Kaur Heer,Zorawar Singh,Anita Meet,Bhotu Shah,Surender Sharma

title: Nabar
synopsis: Nabar, which means 'rebel without a cause', is a family drama that focuses on fly-by-night immigration operators misleading the naive youth in their lure to go abroad.

title: Sikander
synopsis: Sikander is a story of contemporary Punjabi youth. This film is an insiders narrative, representing the corrupt practices and cruel politics in educational institutions which degrade these institutions.

title: Ronde Saare Vyah Picho
synopsis: Amar Deep meets the beautiful Manipreet when their marriage is arranged and immediately falls in love with her. But he soon finds out that the charming girl is used to marrying men and running away.

title: Rab Ton Sohna Ishq
synopsis: Childhood sweethearts Kiran & Sooraj are torn apart by Kiran's gangster older brother. What happens when they come face to face years later?

title: Dil Pardesi Ho Gaya
synopsis: Major Ram, from the Indian Army, is held captive in Pakistan after a war. His brother Sunny, takes upon himself to save him. He lands up in Pakistan and meets Rukhsar. Rukhsar is daughter of a Pakistani brigadier.

stars.name: Inderjit Nikku,Sana Nawaz Khan,Daljeet Kaur,Shakti Kapoor,Raza Murad

title: Risky Mundey
synopsis: This movie is based on the lives of 2 friends who are passionate about their lives. Theirs is a strong friendship where one can even take lives for the other. But things change when a mysterious murder takes place.

title: You N Me
synopsis: The thrilling love story of Varinder Grewal & Jyotika set against confusion & chaos.

title: Punjab Bolda
synopsis: Gurbaj manages a theater troupe and influences the local youth to rise up against the government.

title: Power Cut
synopsis: A satire on the dismal power situation in the state of Punjab and the working of the Punjab State Power Corporation Limited.

title: Raula Pai Gaya
synopsis: This movie features lives of college students, who deal with the ups and downs in life in a very optimistic way.

title: Burrraahh
synopsis: A group of college boys compete in the national folk dance festival to save their college.

title: Pure Punjabi
synopsis: Four friends from Punjab embark on a journey to make a mark in the world of pop music and form a band. While they face opposition from their parents, they continue to pursue their passions.

title: Pata Nahi Rabb Kehdeyan Rangan Ch Raazi
synopsis: Harman, who hails from a poor family, falls for rich girl Simran. He goes to Bangkok and returns to his land after earning wealth and success. He meets up with Simran and hopes to confess his love.

title: Sadi Gali Aaya Karo
synopsis: A love triangle that revolves around two young lads, one from Punjab and one from Haryana. The twist in the tale occurs when both boys fall in love with the same girl who belongs to Chandigarh.

title: Saadi Wakhri Hai Shaan
synopsis: The movie covers every aspect of the true Punjabi life. It outlines the grandeur, exuberance, family values, traits and overall zest for life of Punjabis.

title: Kabaddi Once Again
synopsis: A village boy dreams to take Kabbadi on international standards. But his dreams get shattered when he gets to know about fixing and use of illegal drugs.

title: Munde Patiale De
synopsis: Three college friends Samar, Gill and Lucky, who meet up after a long time at Samar’s wedding, and the funny situations that they land up in, makes for the plot. The film is an out-and-out comedy.

title: Veeran Naal Sardari
synopsis: Roop is brave while her brother Jujhar is a scared guy. Gary is a bully who is constantly behind Jujhar. But when he gets arrested he decides to take revenge and that changes everything.

stars.name: Harry Ahluwalia,Sapna thakur,Ria juj,Raziya Sukhbir,Gurchet Chitarkar

title: Yaar Anmulle
synopsis: Guri, Deep and Sher Singh are three university friends living in a hostel. They experience all aspects of friendship like bunking classes, dealing with rival groups and matters of the heart.

title: The Lion Of Punjab
synopsis: The story revolves around a bunch of Indians in the US trying to keep the Bollywood spirit alive.

title: Hero Hitler In Love
synopsis: Story of a man named Hitler who is liked by everyone in his village until he marries a girl from Pakistan.

title: MLA Natha Singh
synopsis: MLA Natha Singh is a political satire using Punjab as a backdrop. It is a funny perspective on the political scenario in Punjab and has old style punjabi humor.

title: Panjaban
synopsis: The story revolves around two sisters, Gurjot and Gurpreet, born and brought up in an affluent family. The situations that they become a part of due to their varying perspective, forms the crux of the story.

title: Ekam
synopsis: The film revolves around the present day problems in Punjab and how a boy who has come to his land after a long time fights to put things straight in his ancestral village in Punjab.

title: Lagda Ishq Ho Gaya
synopsis: Love is the air for Prince who finds his soulmate in Raavi. But as fate would have it, they are separted and have to fight against their destiny to be with each other.

title: Asa Nu Maan Watna Da
synopsis: Asa Nu Maan Watna Da revolves around Asians who return to their motherland after living abroad for most of their lives.

stars.name: Harbhajan Mann,Kimi Verma,Neeru Bajwa,Deep Dhillon,Gurpreet Guggi

title: Mahaul Theek Hai
synopsis: A couple is tantalized by a corrupt police superintendent who misuses his authority to threaten people. While trying to cope with the situations, they find themselves entangled in a web of deception.

title: Uchaa Pind
synopsis: Uchaa Pind is a 1994 Punjabi film directed by Sukhjinder Shera. It is considered among the great hits in the history of Punjabi cinema. It starred Raj Babber, Sukhjinder Shera, Preeti Sapru, Anil Sharma, B N Sharma and Surinder Sharma.

title: Badla Jatti Da
synopsis: This is the story of Gulabo Kaur who decides to avenge the slaughter of her entire family by forcing a marriage between her son and her neimises daughter.

title: Kee Banu Duniya Daa
synopsis: A truck driver's son who goes on to become a famous singer quits it all to become a truck-driver to licate his father's murderers. Is he able to avenge the murder of his father is the story of the film.

stars.name: Daljit Kaur,Gurdas Mann,Manjit Mann,Mehar Mittal,Dara Singh,Surinder Shinda

title: Jatt Da Gandasa
synopsis: A widowed mother raises her sons in hopes of of avenging her husband's murder. But what happens when one of her sons falls in love with the said muderer's only daughter?

title: Putt Jattan De
synopsis: Putt Jattan De  is a 1981 Punjabi film produced by Devinder Singh Gill & Iqbal Dhillon and directed by Jagjit Gill. It is considered among the great hits in the history of Punjabi cinema.

title: Giddha
synopsis: Reshma's stepmother Ramkali wishes for her blind daughter to be married to Dr. Balbir. Destiny has other plans in store as Dr. Balbir and Reshma fall in love. Will Ramkali be able to break them up? Or will love win against all odds?

title: Teri Meri Ik Jindri
synopsis: Teri Meri Ik Jindri is the story of a rich, spoilt girl who falls in love and is completely changed. “The film addresses true love, which is non-existent in today’s generation and also faith that’s again becoming extinct.”

title: Kankan De Ohle
synopsis: Everyone in the village is fond of Madan whose father is in prison. An evil money lender becomes a problem for the villagers who then seek the help of Madan. Will Madan fight for his people?

title: Sutlej De Kande
synopsis: Satluj De Kande is a 1964 National Award winning Punjabi romantic film directed by M. M. Billoo Mehra and produced by Padam Prakash Maheshwary, starring Balraj Sahni and Nishi in lead roles.

title: Chaudhary Karnail Singh
synopsis: What happens when a Sikh father who is also the village Sarpanch has to choose sides between his own son and a Muslim couple is the crux of the movie.
